name: dine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to eat the main meal of the day, usually in the evening: I hate dining alone. We dined by candlelight. He once dined with the president of France.

dine and dash US informal
to eat a meal in a restaurant and then leave without paying: If you dine and dash, the restaurant can call the police on you.

dine on/upon something
dine out
dine out on something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to eat, esp. the main meal of the day, usually in the evening: He dined alone that night. This evening we’ll be dining out (= having an evening meal away from home).
